content.text: [@kas](@RuNxm8SRujPcJx6GjtTQHp6hprAFv5voEkcvoAkB8Pk=.ed25519) That's strange, but it looks to me like you're running it correctly. Could you edit `~/.npm-global/lib/node_modules/scuttlebot/bin.js` to add `console.log(config)` [here](https://github.com/ssbc/scuttlebot/blob/2c85a75d01d18ca05ecc169bb70aa59e85ebab0f/bin.js#L25)? That should at least verify that the config is being loaded correctly.
